direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the case of the first character of a string but in opposite directions.
Both methods involve modifying the case of characters in a string, though toTitleCase modifies all words in the string.
Both methods modify the case of characters in a string, though toLowerCase modifies all characters.
Both methods modify the case of characters in a string, though toUpperCase modifies all characters.
Both methods handle string manipulation with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods may be used in conjunction to prepare strings for display or further processing.
